Translations.Text: Nnwen uzgen n wayen id ooant tlawin nnwen, ma ur sâint ara tarwa. Ma sâant mmit sent, i kunwi amur wis kué n wayen id ooant, kkes ed ayen ippuseôfen ne$ îlabat. I nitenti, amur wis kué n wayen id teooam, ma ur tesâim ara mmit wen. Ma tesâam mmit wen, i nitenti amur wis îam n wayen id teooam, kkes ed ayen ippuseôfen ne$ îlabat. Ma d argaz awêid ne$ d tameîîut tawêiî, ma isâa agmat ne$ taultmap, i yal wa segsen, amur wis sdis. Ma deg waîas ay llan, ad feôqen amur wis krav, war ccqa, kkes ed ayen ippuseôfen ne$ îlabat. D aweûûi n Öebbi. Öebbi Iéôa, Iêellem
D tigi ay d tilisa n Öebbi. Win issemêessen i Öebbi akked Umazan iS, a t Issekcem ar leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, degsen ad wekkôen. D wagi ay d rrbeê ameqwôaêan
Win iâuûan Öebbi akked Umazan iS, izegren tilas iS, a t Issekcem ar tmes, degs ad iwekkeô, ad isâaddi aâaqeb isdullun
I tid ixedmen lâaô di tlawin nnwen, awit ed, fellasent, kué inagan nnwen. Ma cehhden d, kemnet pent di texxamin, alamma teddem itent tmeppant, ne$ Iga yasent Öebbi abrid
Wid segwen it ixedmen, âaqbet pen. Ma nedmen, u xedmen ayen ilhan, anfet asen. Öebbi, s tidep, Izga Issuruf, Ipêunu
Issuruf kan Öebbi i wid ixedmen cceôô ur éôin, sinna, steôoâen, war laâvil. Widak, ad asen Issuref Öebbi. Öebbi Izga d Bab n ûûwab, d Amusnaw
Ur illi usuref i wid ixedmen tucmitin. Alamma, mi d tusa yiwen tmeppant, a d yini: "nek steôoâe$ tura". Akken, wid immuten u nitni d ijehliyen. Widak, Nhegga yasen d aâaqeb aqeôêan

A wid iumnen! Ur awen iêell ara a pweôten tilawin, ur qbilent, ne$ ad asent tekksem jjwao, iwakken a ppawim amur seg wayen i sent tefkam, siwa ma xedment lâaô ibanen. Illit yidsent, s lqanun. Ma tkeôhem tent, ahat tkeôhem ayen ideg Irra Öebbi lxiô meqqwôen
Ma teb$am a pbedlem tameîîut s tayev, u tefkam tuççit i yiwet, ur as tekkset acemma. Ma tekksem, d ayen n dir u d abekkav n ûûeê
Amek ara tekksem imi temyekcamem, u bbwint s$uôwen laâqed meqqwôen
Ur ppa$et tilawin i u$en ibabaten nnwen, kkes ed ayen iâaddan. Ayagi, s tidep, d lâaô, d dduni, d yir brid

Pwadeglent awen tyimmatin nnwen, issit nnwen, tissetmatin nnwen, tiâamtiwin nnwen, tixaltitin nnwen, issit n ugmat, issit n tweltmap, tiyimmatin nnwen i kwen issuîîven, tissetmatin nnwen ukud teîîvem, tivegwalin nnwen, issit id tessekrem n tlawin nnwen ukud tcerkem usu - ma ur tecrikem ara usu, ulac u$ilif -, tilawin n warraw id turwem. Ur zdukulet snat tsetmatin, kkes ed ayen iâaddan, - Öebbi, s tidep, Izga Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
